verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w commend|strong="G4921"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* Phebe, \w our|strong="G2532"\w* \w sister|strong="G0079"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* ministry \w of|strong="G1577"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w*, \w that|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* Cenchrae:

\w That|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w receive|strong="G4327"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w as|strong="G1722"\w* becometh \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* assist \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* whatsoever business \w she|strong="G0846"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w need|strong="G5535"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w she|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* hath assisted \w many|strong="G4183"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w myself|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*.

Salute \w Prisca|strong="G4251"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Aquila|strong="G0207"\w*, \w my|strong="G1722"\w* helpers \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*,

(\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w my|strong="G3956"\w* \w life|strong="G5590"\w* laid down \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w necks|strong="G5137"\w*: \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w only|strong="G3441"\w* \w give|strong="G2168"\w* \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w churches|strong="G1577"\w* \w of|strong="G1577"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*,)

Salute \w Andronicus|strong="G0408"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Junias|strong="G2458"\w*, \w my|strong="G1722"\w* kinsmen \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fellow|strong="G4869"\w* \w prisoners|strong="G4869"\w*: \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G0652"\w* note \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*.

Salute \w them|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G1510"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* Aristobulus’ household. Salute Herodian, \w my|strong="G1722"\w* kinsman. Salute \w them|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G1510"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* Narcissus’ household, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

Salute \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* an \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w kiss|strong="G5370"\w*. \w All|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w churches|strong="G1577"\w* \w of|strong="G1577"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* salute \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* beseech \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w to|strong="G2532"\w* mark \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w dissensions|strong="G1370"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* offences \w contrary|strong="G3844"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* doctrine \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w learned|strong="G3129"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w avoid|strong="G1578"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1438"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w*, \w serve|strong="G1398"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w our|strong="G5547"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w belly|strong="G2836"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* pleasing speeches \w and|strong="G2532"\w* good \w words|strong="G2532"\w*, seduce \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w innocent|strong="G0172"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w your|strong="G3956"\w* \w obedience|strong="G5218"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* published \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* place. \w I|strong="G1161"\w* \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1161"\w* \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w wise|strong="G4680"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* simple \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w crush|strong="G4937"\w* \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w your|strong="G2962"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* \w speedily|strong="G5034"\w*. \w The|strong="G3588"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w be|strong="G2316"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w Timothy|strong="G5095"\w*, \w my|strong="G2532"\w* \w fellow|strong="G4904"\w* labourer, saluteth \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lucius|strong="G3066"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jason|strong="G2394"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sosipater|strong="G4989"\w*, \w my|strong="G2532"\w* kinsmen.

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w Tertius|strong="G5060"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* epistle, salute \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

Caius, \w my|strong="G2532"\w* \w host|strong="G3581"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w*, saluteth \w you|strong="G5210"\w*. \w Erastus|strong="G2037"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w treasurer|strong="G3623"\w* \w of|strong="G1577"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, saluteth \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Quartus|strong="G2890"\w*, \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*.

\w The|strong="G3956"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w of|strong="G5485"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w be|strong="G3956"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G1410"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w able|strong="G1410"\w* \w to|strong="G1410"\w* \w establish|strong="G4741"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G1410"\w* \w my|strong="G2596"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w preaching|strong="G2782"\w* \w of|strong="G2098"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G1410"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w revelation|strong="G0602"\w* \w of|strong="G2098"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G2424"\w* \w kept|strong="G4601"\w* \w secret|strong="G4601"\w* \w from|strong="G2596"\w* \w eternity|strong="G0166"\w*,
